metadata.synopsis: AD for damned souls that are flying inside House of Hope
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. CTY_Main_A2. Travel to House of Hope through debug book3. oe LOW_HOH_SaveHope4. Wander around the House

0.speaker: Errant Soul
0.text: You shouldn't be here. None of us should.
0.context: NodeContext: quietly threatening, watching an intruder but unable to take action because he is little more than a ghost
